column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " You invited him , but not me ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Please , Korra , it 's not personal .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Korra , we 're in the middle of a meeting and we ca n't have people just barge in whenever they want !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Guys !
#Text=Oh , perfect !
#Text=You 're all here .
#Text=" Opal and Mako says : " Bolin ?
#Text=" Raiko says : " What are you doing here ?!
#Text=Guards , remove these traitors !
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=We escaped Kuvira 's army !
#Text=We 're back on your side now !
#Text=We have top secret information for you !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Okay , I guess we should 've opened with that line .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Listen to me .
#Text=Kuvira 's making this thing that goes I do n't know how it works , but it has this " Varrick says : " It 's a super weapon !
#Text=Like a regular weapon , only super .
#Text=" Korra says : " And let me guess : it has something to do with spirit vines .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Yes !
#Text=How did you know ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I saw a vision of her taking spirit vines from the swamp .
#Text=" Varrick says : " If she figures out how to harness their power , we are all doomed .
#Text=" Raiko says : " She might use the weapon to attack Republic City .
#Text=The only way to protect ourselves is with a preemptive strike .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " My airbenders wo n't be part of an unprovoked attack !
#Text=" Izumi says : " Neither will the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Raiko says : " But , Fire Lord Izumi , Kuvira is a threat to the world !
#Text=She has to be stopped !
#Text=" Izumi says : " The Fire Nation has spent too much of its history fighting nonsense wars .
#Text=And I refuse to drag my nation into another one unless there is no other choice .
#Text=If you attack Kuvira , you 'll do it without my army .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Fine .
#Text=I 'll hold off any plans of attack .
#Text=We 'll go on the defensive and fortify security on the borders .
#Text=" Izumi says : " In that , you 'll have my help .
#Text="
